title: In-game profanity is blocked but on the client it is disabled? (alpha client)
body:
If anyone uses profanity in-game it is censored but in the alpha client it is disabled. Anyone know a fix and whats causing it?  
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe the in-client option to disable the language filter is currently broken, however typing **/chatfilter** while in game should allow you to enable/disable the chat filter.
thankyou so much man, this worked!!
